thread.title: Ian Poulter, Piers Morgan and AP McCoy lead celebrity Arsenal fans' despair on Twitter after Bayern humiliation
thread.title_full: Ian Poulter, Piers Morgan and AP McCoy lead celebrity Arsenal fans' despair on Twitter after Bayern humiliation

author: Jim Daly
title: Ian Poulter, Piers Morgan and AP McCoy lead celebrity Arsenal fans' despair on Twitter after Bayern humiliation
text:
Ian Poulter, Piers Morgan and AP McCoy lead celebrity Arsenal fans' despair on Twitter after Bayern humiliation "We've gone from invincible to invisibles" Share Arsenal's players look humiliated in Germany and the celebrity fans felt the same on Twitter (Photo: BongartsGetty Images) Share Get Arsenal FC   
Arsenal Twitter is in meltdown. 
Following the Gunners' 5-1 humiliation in Germany to Bayern Munich fans are taking to social media to voice their unhappiness. 
And that included a host of celebrity Arsenal fans who couldn't hide their despair following the drubbing in Germany. 
Thiago scored twice as Carlo Ancelotti's team demolished the Gunners by the same scoreline for the second year running leaving Arsene Wenger's future hanging in the balance . 
Champion jockey AP McCoy couldn't hide his disappointment 
Of course Piers Morgan got involved 
Matt Lucas spun his usual sharp wit on the result 
Golfer Ian Poulter was angry Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
